body: {"name": "Figma", "description": "Figma is a web-based interface design and prototyping tool. It allows multiple designers to collaborate in real-time on the same project. Figma is known for its user-friendly interface and powerful features, including vector tools, prototyping, and developer handoff. It operates on a freemium model.", "review": "Figma is a top choice for design collaboration. Its real-time collaboration features and powerful design tools make it ideal for teams working on UI/UX projects.", "url": "https://www.figma.com/", "image": "https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/3/33/Figma-logo.svg", "createdBy": "mock user", "recommend": ["user13", "user14"], "tags": ["design", "prototyping", "collaboration"]}
